00032 MMLDocument::MMLDocument() : MMLNode(this) {
00033         root = 0;
00034         border = 25;
00035         active = 0;
00036         mathcursor = new MathCursor(this);
00037         constmathcursor = new ConstMathCursor(mathcursor);
00038         a = new MML::Attributes();
00039         v = new Views;
00040         v->views.resize(1);
00041         v->views[0].setOwner(this);
00042         v->cv = 0;
00043         v->curview = &(v->views[0]);
00044 }
00045 MMLDocument::~MMLDocument() {
00046         list<MMLNode *>::iterator it;
00047         for (it=nodes.begin(); it != nodes.end(); ++it) {
00048                 delete *it;
00049         }
00050         delete constmathcursor;
00051         delete mathcursor;
00052         delete a;
00053         delete v;
00054 }
00055 MMLElement *
00056 MMLDocument::createElement(const DOMString &tagName) {
00057         MMLElement *mmle;
00058         if (tagName == "mi") {  // ever heard of switch statements?
00059                 mmle = new MMLmi(this);
00060         } else if (tagName == "mn") {
00061                 mmle = new MMLmn(this);
00062         } else if (tagName == "mo") {
00063                 mmle = new MMLmo(this);
00064         } else if (tagName == "mtext") {
00065                 mmle = new MMLmtext(this);
00066         } else if (tagName == "mfrac") {
00067                 mmle = new MMLmfrac(this);
00068         } else if (tagName == "mrow") {
00069                 mmle = new MMLmrow(this);
00070         } else if (tagName == "mphantom") {
00071                 mmle = new MMLmphantom(this);
00072         } else if (tagName == "msub") {
00073                 mmle = new MMLmsub(this);
00074         } else if (tagName == "msup") {
00075                 mmle = new MMLmsup(this);
00076         } else if (tagName == "msubsup") {
00077                 mmle = new MMLmsubsup(this);
00078         } else if (tagName == "msqrt") {
00079                 mmle = new MMLmsqrt(this);
00080         } else if (tagName == "mroot") {
00081                 mmle = new MMLmroot(this);
00082         } else if (tagName == "mfenced") {
00083                 mmle = new MMLmfenced(this);
00084         } else if (tagName == "mstyle") {
00085                 mmle = new MMLmstyle(this);
00086         } else if (tagName == "math") {
00087                 mmle = new MMLmath(this);
00088         } else if (tagName == "merror") {
00089                 mmle = new MMLmerror(this);
00090         } else {
00091                 bool allowed = false;
00092                 for (uint i=0; !allowed && i<MML::numElements; ++i) {
00093                         allowed = tagName == MML::elementTag[i];
00094                 }
00095                 if (allowed) {
00096                         errmsg = "Tag '" + tagName
00097                                 + "' is not available in this implementation.";
00098                 } else {
00099                         errmsg = "Tag '" + tagName
00100                         + "' is not allowed in MathML.";
00101                 }
00102                 valid = false;
00103                 validated = true;
00104                 mmle = NULL;
00105         }
00106         if (mmle) {
00107                 nodes.push_back(mmle);
00108         }
00109         return mmle;
00110 }
00111 MMLText *
00112 MMLDocument::createTextNode(const DOMString &s) {
00113         MMLText *mmlt = new MMLText(this);
00114         mmlt->setData(s);
00115         if (mmlt) {
00116                 nodes.push_back(mmlt);
00117         }
00118         return mmlt;
00119 }
00120 MMLmrow *
00121 MMLDocument::createInferredmrow(MMLElement *e) {
00122         // create the inferred mrow
00123         MMLmrow *mrow = new MMLmrow(this);
00124         mrow->inferred = true;
00125         nodes.push_back(mrow);
00126 
00127         // move all children of e to the new mrow
00128         MMLNode *n = e->first;
00129         while (n) {
00130                 mrow->appendChild(n); // n is automatically removed from e
00131                 n = e->first;
00132         }
00133         return mrow;
00134 }
00135 MMLmo *
00136 MMLDocument::createInferredmo(const DOMString &s) {
00137         // create the inferred mo
00138         MMLmo *mo = new MMLmo(this);
00139         mo->inferred = true;
00140         nodes.push_back(mo);
00141         MMLText *text = createTextNode(s);
00142         text->inferred = true;
00143         mo->appendChild(text);
00144         return mo;
00145 }
00146 /* This function checks that the document has exactly one node of type
00147    element. */
00148 void
00149 MMLDocument::checkRoot() {
00150         if (!valid) return;
00151         MMLNode *n = first;
00152         valid = false;
00153         while (n) {
00154                 if (n->isElement()) {
00155                         // if root is not yet set or points to a removed element
00156                         if (!root || root->parentNode() != this) {
00157                                 root = static_cast<MMLElement *>(n);
00158                                 valid = true;
00159                         } else if (root != n) {
00160                                 errmsg = "MMLDocument must contain exactly "
00161                                                 "one math element.";
00162                                 valid = false;
00163                         }
00164                 }
00165                 n = n->next;
00166         }
00167 }
00168 const MMLElement *
00169 MMLDocument::documentElement() const {
00170         return root;
00171 }
00172 MMLElement *
00173 MMLDocument::documentElement() {
00174         return root;
00175 }
00176 bool
00177 MMLDocument::validate() {
00178         if (!validated) {
00179                 checkRoot();
00180                 if (valid) {
00181                         if (!root->validate()) {
00182                                 errmsg = root->errorMsg();
00183                                 valid = false;
00184                         } else {
00185                                 valid = true;
00186                         }
00187                 }
00188                 validated = true;
00189         }
00190         return valid;
00191 }
00192 bool
00193 MMLDocument::validate() const {
00194         return validated && valid;
00195 }
00196 void
00197 MMLDocument::layout(MML::Attributes *a) const {
00198         root->doLayout(a);
00199         root->setX(0);
00200         root->setY(0);
00201         v->curview->setWidth(root->getWidth());
00202         v->curview->setAscent(root->getAscent());
00203         v->curview->setDescent(root->getDescent());
00204 }
00205 void
00206 MMLDocument::setPainter(MMLPainter *p) const {
00207     a->setPainter(p);
00208 }
00209 void
00210 MMLDocument::layout() const {
00211         if (a->p && validate()) {
00212                 layout(a);
00213                 // initialize the viewport
00214                 v->views.resize(1);
00215                 v->curview = &(v->views[0]);
00216                 v->curview->setBegin();
00217                 v->curview->setEnd();
00218         }
00219 }
00220 bool
00221 MMLDocument::setMaxViewWidth(float maxwidth) const {
00222         v->curview->setMaxWidth(maxwidth);
00223         MMLNode *n = v->curview->getBegin().rightNode();
00224         // walk tree until width is overrun
00225         float width = 0;
00226 /*      do {
00227         } while (width < maxwidth);
00228         if (width > maxwidth) {
00229         }*/
00230         return false;
00231 }
00232 void
00233 MMLDocument::paint() const {
00234         if (a->p && validate()) {
00235                 float x = getX();
00236                 float y = getY();
00237                 a->p->translate(x,y);
00238                 root->doPaint(a);
00239                 // debug code: we draw the point the cursor was last set to
00240                 if (mathcursor) {
00241                         float cy = mathcursor->getY();
00242                         float cx = mathcursor->getX();
00243                         a->p->drawLine(cx, cy, cx, cy);
00244                 }
00245                 a->p->translate(-x,-y);
00246         }
00247 }

00260 void
00261 MMLDocument::setCurrentView(ushort cv) const{
00262         assert(cv < v->views.size());

00264         v->curview = &(v->views[cv]);
